morning.name: Guard Patrol Routes
morning.description: You notice the guards follow predictable patterns
morning.dialogueFragment: I've been watching the guards. They change shifts at dawn and dusk.

morning.name: Merchant Gossip
morning.dialogueFragment: The merchants are saying silk prices will rise next week.

morning.name: Noble Presence
morning.description: A noble's carriage arrives at the square
morning.dialogueFragment: I saw Lord Blackwood's carriage this morning. He seemed agitated.

afternoon.name: Busy Crowds
afternoon.dialogueFragment: The market is so crowded now, no one would notice us talking.

afternoon.name: Vendor Argument
afternoon.dialogueFragment: Those vendors fighting over stall space revealed interesting information.

evening.name: Last Minute Deals
evening.description: Merchants eager to sell before closing
evening.dialogueFragment: The merchants are desperate to clear inventory before closing.

evening.name: Shift Change
evening.description: Guards are distracted during shift change
evening.dialogueFragment: The guards are changing shifts. This is our opportunity.

withElena.name: Shared Hardship
withElena.dialogueFragment: I understand Elena's situation better now. We have more in common than I thought.

withElena.name: Elena's Tells
withElena.description: You notice when Elena is nervous
withElena.dialogueFragment: Elena touches her necklace when she's anxious. She's doing it now.

withMarcus.name: Marcus's Network
withMarcus.dialogueFragment: Marcus mentioned his contacts in the silk guild. That could be useful.

withMarcus.name: Marcus's Greed
withMarcus.description: His love of gold is obvious
withMarcus.dialogueFragment: Marcus's eyes lit up at the mention of profit. He can't resist a good deal.

mainHall.name: Tavern Warmth
mainHall.dialogueFragment: The warmth and ale make everyone more talkative here.

mainHall.name: Regular Customers
mainHall.dialogueFragment: These regulars hear everything. They're better than spies.

morning.name: Servant Network
morning.dialogueFragment: The servants talk when they think no one's listening.

morning.name: Court Etiquette
morning.dialogueFragment: I've learned the proper way to address nobility. It opens doors.

withBlackwood.name: Blackwood's Ambition
withBlackwood.dialogueFragment: Lord Blackwood wants a seat on the royal council. The marriage is political.

withBlackwood.name: Under Pressure
withBlackwood.dialogueFragment: Blackwood needs this marriage soon. The king's summons approaches.

withCaptain.name: Captain's Pragmatism
withCaptain.description: The captain values results over rules
withCaptain.dialogueFragment: The captain cares more about keeping peace than following every law.

withCaptain.name: Guard Intelligence
withCaptain.dialogueFragment: The captain's guards report everything. He knows more than he lets on.

morning.name: Training Schedule
morning.dialogueFragment: The guards train every morning. They're too busy to patrol properly.

general.name: Forbidden Section
general.dialogueFragment: I found books the nobles don't want commoners reading.

general.name: Research Discovery
general.dialogueFragment: This old text mentions something relevant to our situation.

withScholar.name: Scholar's Insight
withScholar.dialogueFragment: The scholar explained the historical context. Everything makes more sense now.

night.name: Smuggler Routes
night.dialogueFragment: I saw smugglers unloading at the third pier. They paid off the guards.

night.name: Departure Times
night.dialogueFragment: Ships to the capital leave at dawn. Passage costs 20 coins.

withSailor.name: Sailor Stories
withSailor.dialogueFragment: The sailor's stories of foreign lands give perspective on our troubles.

general.name: Spiritual Clarity
general.dialogueFragment: The temple's peace helped me see things clearly.

general.name: Priestly Counsel
general.dialogueFragment: The priest's words about duty and conscience ring true.

withPriest.name: Confession Secrets
withPriest.description: The priest hints at others' sins
withPriest.dialogueFragment: The priest can't break the seal, but his hints are revealing.

evening.name: Life Imitates Art
evening.dialogueFragment: This play about forbidden love and arranged marriages... it's too familiar.

evening.name: Actor Network
evening.dialogueFragment: Actors perform for nobles and beggars alike. They hear everything.
